Dev 拒绝 CVE 严重性，将他的 GitHub 存储库设置为只读https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/dev-rejects-cve-severity-makes-his-github-repo-read-only/ Sun, 30 Jun 2024 10:31:14 -0400阿克斯·夏尔马Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/dev-rejects-cve-severity-makes-his-github-repo-read-only/ The popular open source project, 'ip' had its GitHub repository archived, or made "read-only" by its developer as a result of a dubious CVE report filed for his project. Unfortunately, open-source developers have recently been met with an uptick in debatable or outright bogus CVEs filed for their projects. [...]
